description: Creative Enzymes has been granted with the largest market share in enzyme activity measuring for several years. We have the comprehensive expertise and advanced facilitates to offer the best support to your research. The professional assay approaches and high-quality testing have satisfied the need of thousands scientists. With the strong presence in method development and data analysis, Creative Enzymes can supply reliable customized services in a rapid turnover. Noticing the increasing demands in radiometric enzyme assays, Creative Enzymes established standardized radiometric assay services for enzyme activity and kinetics uses.
name: Radiometric Enzyme Assays
